name: The EyeStalk Official Game
description:
This is a 2D RPG game that I have been wanting to make for a really long time. This game contains: Lots of easy to learn machanic's, Custom Made Music, and most importantly Tons of LORE. If anyone try to solve the lore to you I say good luck cause there is at least 10-15 documents of just pure lore in there so goodluck.

Story: You wake up in the middle of nowhere you seem to have lost your memory and you have to try and get them back you only remember a few things like where you live and what took your memory. All you know is that the thing took something precious and you want payback for taking it. That thing that EyeStalk took everything from you and now its your turn to take it down.
